entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3831
entry.content: No significant changes were made. We have just fixed minor bugs for this release. You can find the detailed information in the commit history.

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.3887
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- feat: add CaptureSpan decorator to multiple classes for enhanced telemetry tracking - PR: #1853 - Fix Schedule Maintence Event Number Concatenating instead of incrementing - PR: #1855
</details>
